name: omnisharp-brackets
title: omnisharp-brackets
description:
C# IDE plugin for brackets.io.
OmniSharp is a family of Open Source projects, each with one goal - To enable great .NET development in YOUR editor of choice.

 IMPORTANT: You must run the install script in the extension directory for the plugin to work.

This is because of a limitation on the size of the extensions size
author: Mathew McLoughlin mathew.mcloughlin@gmail.com (http://omnisharp.net)
